text: "The Heat Is On" is a 1984 song by Glenn Frey and it was taken from the 1984 movie soundtrack Beverly Hills Cop. It went to number 2 in Australia, Norway and the United States, number 4 in Germany, number 5 in Sweden and Switzerland, number 8 in Canada, number 12 in the United Kingdom, number 19 in the Netherlands, number 22 in New Zealand, number 27 in Austria and Belgium and number 47 in France. It also became a theme song to NBA team Miami Heat. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Glenn Frey songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: The Heat Is On (Glenn Frey song)
